name: Studio Site
description: Sets up studio site with Boilerplate Theme
author: Etch UK

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Collection of elements making up content of the page.
Collection of elements making up content of the homepage.

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides a Liquid formatted body for your content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Provides meta tags for your content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a way to add widgets per content items.
Provides a customizable body for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Customise common attributes on HTML element.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Colour displayed as the background for the section.
Control how content is aligned within section.
Width of container for section content.
Text to be displayed in link.
URL user is taken to when interacting with link.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Whether a new window is opened when user interacts with link.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Open in new Window

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Appearance of link.
Text to be displayed in heading.
Importance of the heading, where the lower the value the more important the heading.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Caption displayed alongside image.
Control how images can be manipulated around text content.
Whether the background should be an image or a video embed.

ResponsiveMediaFieldSettings.Hint: Image displayed as background of hero.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: URL to third-party site that is hosting video (e.g. YouTube).
Text displayed on call to action link.
Page user is navigated to when selecting call to action link.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.
Description of the appearance and function of the image.

ContentPickerFieldSettings.Hint: Main menu used by users to navigate the main sections of the site.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Label for button that's displayed on smaller devices to toggle the visibility of the main menu.
URL to content that should be embedded (e.g. https://www.youtube.com/embed/TorVk3Hxm7Q).
Caption displayed to give description of embedded content.

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a custom url for your content item.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior for your content item.

ContentPickerFieldSettings.Hint: Choose content item that is displayed when user selects link.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Description of image for website visitors who are unable to see the image and tell the search engine crawlers about the image.
Colour of section background.
Description of image for website visitors who are unable to see the image and tell the search engine crawlers about the image.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: If checked, the title will be rendered at top of the page.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Display Title

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Width of grid.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Whether items in the grid should wrap to next row.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Wrap

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: When checked there will be a gap between grid items.
BooleanFieldSettings.Label: Gutter

Text.Text: Explore and survive in an infinite procedurally generated universe

Content.Data: {"time":1586647761097,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We are a BAFTA-winning, independent game developer with a reputation for innovation in both storytelling and VR. We have released a number of successful titles and are best known for the critically acclaimed PS4 hit Until Dawn and the recently launched The Dark Pictures Anthology. The latter is a series of stand-alone, horror games for PS4, Xbox and PC. The first game is Man of Medan."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Founded in 2008, the studio is now home to over 150 talented individuals working across a range of storytelling titles. We've built a track record of high-end production backed up with delivery and reliability. We teamed up with ITN Productions and games trade body TIGA to create this video that explains more about us and how we work."}}],"version":"2.15.0"}
